title: Negative Squared Latin Capital Letter O

nouns: A two-dimensional geometric figure, a disk, consisting of the set of all those points of a plane at a distance less than or equal to a fixed distance from another point.
Ellipse in which the two axes are of equal length; a plane curve generated by one point moving at a constant distance from a fixed point
A circle is a simple shape of Euclidean geometry that is the set of all points in a plane that are at a given distance from a given point, the center.
Circles are simple shapes of Euclidean geometry consisting of those points in a plane which are equidistant from a given point, the center.
A two-dimensional, geometric shape that is made up of every point on a plane which is equidistant from the centre. May be drawn with a pair of compasses.

description: A symbol representing Blood Type O. Displayed as the letter O on a red background.
apple_vendor_description: The O blood type emoji, as rendered on Apple devices, features a clean, circular white button with a bold, dark red 'O' clearly inscribed within, all presented with Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded edges. Realistic lighting gives the button a subtle depth and a polished feel, making it easily identifiable and professional. This emoji is a straightforward way to communicate one‚Äôs blood type in medical contexts or discussions related to health and donation on Apple.
